name: More Object Info
description: A mod that improves editor object info.

dynamic-object-info.name: Dynamic Object Info
dynamic-object-info.description: Whether to update the object info text in real-time.

object-properties.name: Object Properties
object-properties.description: Settings for showing object properties in the object info text.

show-object-id.name: ID
show-object-id.description: Whether to show the object's ID.

show-object-position.name: Position
show-object-position.description: Whether to show the object's position.

show-object-rotation.name: Rotation
show-object-rotation.description: Whether to show the object's rotation.

show-object-scale.name: Scale
show-object-scale.description: Whether to show the object's scale.

show-object-base-color.name: Base Color HSV
show-object-base-color.description: Whether to show the object's base color HSV.

show-object-detail-color.name: Detail Color HSV
show-object-detail-color.description: Whether to show the object's detail color HSV.

show-object-type.name: Type
show-object-type.description: Whether to show the object's type.

show-object-address.name: Address
show-object-address.description: Whether to show the object's address.

show-object-data.name: Data
show-object-data.description: Whether to show the object's data.
